description: This Dart source file defines the 'ReservationsPage' widget and related components for a Flutter application. It manages displaying a list of reservations, rendering individual reservation cards, handling an empty state, and providing a modal dialog for creating new reservations. The file interacts with external providers, models, and widgets to facilitate reservation management and UI presentation.

classes.name: ReservationsPage
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a list of reservations with a header and an empty state when there are no reservations.

classes.name: _ReservationCard
classes.description: A widget that displays individual reservation details inside a Card, including the name, guests, date/time, phone, notes, and a cancel button.

classes.name: _EmptyState
classes.description: A widget that displays a message and icon when there are no reservations.

methods.name: showReservationModal
methods.description: A public function that opens a modal dialog allowing users to fill out a form to create a new reservation.
